statements: SELECT * FROM material_costs ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, unit_cost FROM material_costs WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT material_name, total_cost FROM material_costs WHERE unit_cost < 100.00;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM material_costs WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 50.00 AND 200.00;
SELECT material_id, material_name, total_cost FROM material_costs WHERE material_name LIKE '%wood%'
SELECT material_name, unit_cost FROM material_costs WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY unit_cost DESC;
SELECT material_name, total_cost FROM material_costs WHERE unit_cost < 50 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_costs WHERE unit_cost BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT material_name, quantity, total_cost FROM material_costs WHERE unit_cost > 30 AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT AVG(unit_cost), MAX(quantity), MIN(total_cost) FROM material_costs;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM materials WHERE material_price > 50 ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_price < 100 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM printing_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_type, expense_cost FROM printing_expenses WHERE expense_cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY expense_cost ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM printing_expenses WHERE expense_cost > 100 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_price, expense_cost FROM materials JOIN printing_expenses ON material_price = expense_cost;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM materials WHERE material_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT material_name, SUM(expense_cost) AS total_expenses FROM materials JOIN printing_expenses ON material_id = expense_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_expenses > 200;
SELECT * FROM material_costs;
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM material_costs;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_name;

SELECT printing_operations.operation_name, material_costs.material_name, expenses.expense_name FROM printing_operations JOIN material_costs ON printing_operations.material_used = material_costs.material_id JOIN expenses ON printing_operations.expense_id = expenses.expense_id;
SELECT * FROM material_costs WHERE material_cost > 1000
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM material_costs ORDER BY material_cost DESC
SELECT operation_name, expense_amount FROM printing_operations JOIN expenses ON printing_operations.expense_id = expenses.expense_id
SELECT material_name, expense_amount FROM material_costs JOIN printing_operations ON material_costs.material_id = printing_operations.material_used
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM MaterialCosts WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM MaterialCosts ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT id, expense_name, amount_spent FROM Expenses WHERE amount_spent < 500;
SELECT * FROM PrintingJobs WHERE job_cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT printer_name, printer_type FROM Printers WHERE printer_status = 'online';
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM MaterialCosts WHERE quantity_purchased > 100;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE amount_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT job_name, job_cost FROM PrintingJobs WHERE job_cost < 500 ORDER BY job_cost ASC;
SELECT printer_name, printer_type FROM Printers WHERE printer_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM MaterialCosts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_costs;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM material_costs ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT job_name, quantity, total_cost FROM printing_jobs WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT printer_name, printer_type FROM printers WHERE printer_type = 'Laser';
SELECT job_id, printer_id, start_date, end_date, status FROM job_history ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM material_costs WHERE cost_per_unit > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT job_name, quantity, total_cost FROM printing_jobs WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT printer_id, printer_name FROM printers WHERE printer_type = 'Laser' ORDER BY printer_name ASC;
SELECT j.job_name, p.printer_name, j.total_cost FROM printing_jobs j JOIN printers p ON j.material_id = p.printer_id WHERE j.quantity >= 50 ORDER BY j.total_cost DESC;
SELECT e.description, e.amount_spent, j.job_name FROM expense_records e INNER JOIN printing_jobs j ON e.expense_date = j.job_id WHERE e.amount_spent < 500 ORDER BY e.expense_date DESC;
